title: I like elephans
content: I like elephants They are big and strong They have long trunks and big ears. Elephants eat plants and fruits I saw one at the zoo last year. It was calm and slow I took pictures of it. I think elephants are kind animals. They live in groups and help each other Elephants are my favorite animal.
